gpo_links.description: GPOLinks at the root of domain
GPOs linked at Domain Controllers node

wmi_filters.name: Windows 10-11
queries: Select * from Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE Version LIKE "10.0.%" and ProductType = "1"
Select * from Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE Version LIKE "11.0.%" and ProductType = "1"

wmi_filters.name: Windows Server 2019-22
queries: Select * from Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE (ProductType = "2" or ProductType = "3")
Select * from Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE (Caption LIKE "%2019%" or Caption LIKE "%2022%")

wmi_filters.name: Windows Server 2019-22 Domain Controller
queries: Select * from Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE (Caption LIKE "%2019%" OR Caption LIKE "%2022%")
